Package utils

Class ExcelLibrary

java.lang.Object
utils.ExcelLibrary
public class ExcelLibrary extends Object
Utility class to work with Excel files.

  • Method Details

    • readCell

      public String readCell​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet, int rowNum, int colNum)
      Reads the value of the cell in the specified row and column of the given sheet.
      Parameters:
      sheet - The Sheet object.
      rowNum - The row number (0-based) of the cell.
      colNum - The column number (0-based) of the cell.
      Returns:
      The value of the cell as a String, or null if the cell is empty.

    • getColumns

      public int getColumns​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet, int rowNo)
      Gets the number of columns in the specified row of the given sheet.
      Parameters:
      sheet - The Sheet object.
      rowNo - The row number (0-based).
      Returns:
      The number of columns in the specified row.

    • getRows

      public int getRows​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet)
      Gets the number of rows in the given sheet.
      Parameters:
      sheet - The Sheet object.
      Returns:
      The number of rows in the sheet.

    • loadExcelFiles

      public List<String> loadExcelFiles​(String excelFolderPath)
      Loads a list of Excel file paths from the specified folder.
      Parameters:
      excelFolderPath - The path of the folder containing Excel files.
      Returns:
      A List of String representing the absolute file paths of Excel files in the folder.

    • getSheetsInWorkbook

      public List<org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet> getSheetsInWorkbook​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook)
      Gets a list of sheets present in the given workbook based on the "Index" sheet.
      Parameters:
      workbook - The Workbook object from which to retrieve sheets.
      Returns:
      A List of Sheet objects that are marked as "YES" in the "Index" sheet.

    • getWorkbook

      public org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook getWorkbook​(String workbookPath)
      Reads and returns a Workbook object from the given workbook file path.
      Parameters:
      workbookPath - The file path of the workbook to read.
      Returns:
      The Workbook object read from the file path, or null if an exception occurs.

    • writeWorkbook

      public void writeWorkbook​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook, String workbookPath)
      Writes the given Workbook object to the specified workbook file path.
      Parameters:
      workbook - The Workbook object to write.
      workbookPath - The file path to which the Workbook should be written.
